items.sentence: Do you really think that it was Tom who gave Mary that black eye?
I think it's highly unlikely Tom will ever face criminal charges.
It's been a long time since I've heard anyone speaking in French.
The police are convinced that Tom didn't die from natural causes.
This shirt isn't the same as that one. The buttons are different.
If you want to get yourself a new hat, then go ahead and get one.
Did you really think that I was the one who painted this picture?
We often fail to realize the extent to which we depend on others.
This airport has the longest runways in this part of the country.
You could've at least pretended that you considered the evidence.
Tom took a key out of his jacket pocket and laid it on the table.
Tom isn't sure that Mary didn't really go to Australia last week.
Tom soon found out that nothing had changed since his last visit.
Tom and Mary have a cute little Christmas tree inside their home.
I bought a pair of gloves for Tom and a pair of mittens for Mary.
Tom forgot to tell Mary what time the meeting was going to start.
I don't know what I would've done if I'd been in Tom's situation.
After it rains and the ground is damp, it's easier to pull weeds.
Tom called Mary a few more times, but she kept hanging up on him.
Tom found something in the basement, but didn't know what it was.
